Not sure why you're saying disciples marcom.  I always liked your stuff and said so, but then you fucked the thread (twice) which was spiteful and basically just cuntish.

You then started some beef with willmelling, no idea why, and you look bent on just doing the same again. You don't come out of this looking great to be honest.
items.html:
Not sure why you're saying disciples marcom. I always liked your stuff and said so, but then you fucked the thread (twice) which was spiteful and basically just cuntish.

You then started some beef with willmelling, no idea why, and you look bent on just doing the same again. You don't come out of this looking great to be honest.

items.markdown:
The beef with willmelling is not a beef but something else which does not regard you or anyone else, he is a good subject for playing games... that's all. And that is the only reason why I posted a few pictures not taken in the same week of the competition, that now would be too long to explain, I can only say that i didn't do it for winning the competition, and I knew very well that the melling was watching my Flickr account etc etc etc.. Still, I would like to know how we can be sure about everyone else about the date of when the picture has been taken, but honestly i wouldn't care less about it... You know, just for the record.

Regarding fucking the thread (twice), as you said, you may not aware that a long time ago, still in respect of transparency, I asked if we could have a vote system more transparent, but nope. So i showed how the system was vulnerable!(Well, I used the melling because he is the most fun to work for in this part of the forum..) Now it's more then 2 years ago and I don't think the vote system has kept in this way only for me, maybe they have realized that having it transparent is better anyway. 

So, in a nutshell, it's me the one that worked for transparency! And the melling & company were, still are, the tools that I used for the pursuit of it. Then obviously, I need to take care about the fun element as well, I can't tell them what to do, they need to do it like if its their will!
